New Records: The New York Mets secured their first NLCS appearance since 2009 with a 4-1 victory over the Philadelphia Phillies.
Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a game-changing grand slam in the sixth inning to send the Mets to the NLCS.
Post-Match Reflections: The Philadelphia Phillies' season ended with a third consecutive playoff loss, while the New York Mets celebrated their NLCS berth.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets' victory marked the end of a long playoff drought for the team and their fans.
